text: The 1976 Campeonato Nacional de Fútbol Profesional was Chilean top tier’s 44th season. Everton was the tournament’s champion, winning its third title. ==Standings== ==Scores== ==Championship play-off== ==Liguilla Pre-Copa Libertadores== \---- \---- === Play-off match === Universidad de Chile qualified to 1977 Copa Libertadores due to its better Liguilla's goal difference ==Promotion/Relegation Liguilla== == Topscorer == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center;" |- !width="205"|Name !width="205"|Team !width="50"|Goals |- || Óscar Fabbiani||Palestino||23 |} == References == == External links == *ANFP *RSSSF Chile 1976 Category:Primera División de Chile seasons Prim Chile
title: 1976 Primera División de Chile
